quote: We shape our buildings thereafter they shape us.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: Whatever good things we build end up building us.
name: Jim Rohn

quote: I don't build in order to have clients. I have clients in order to build.
name: Ayn Rand

quote: A building has integrity just like a man. And just as seldom.
name: Ayn Rand

quote: Every great architect is - necessarily - a great poet. He must be a great original interpreter of his time, his day, his age.
name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: We require from buildings two kinds of goodness: first, the doing their practical duty well: then that they be graceful and pleasing in doing it.
name: John Ruskin

quote: An architect's most useful tools are an eraser at the drafting board, and a wrecking bar at the site.
name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: Light, God's eldest daughter, is a principal beauty in a building.
name: Thomas Fuller

quote: Architecture should speak of its time and place, but yearn for timelessness.
name: Frank Gehry

quote: Less is more.
name: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe

quote: I don't divide architecture, landscape and gardening to me they are one.
name: Luis Barragan

quote: Architecture is the art of how to waste space.
name: Philip Johnson

quote: My passion and great enjoyment for architecture, and the reason the older I get the more I enjoy it, is because I believe we - architects - can effect the quality of life of the people.
name: Richard Rogers

quote: Building art is a synthesis of life in materialised form. We should try to bring in under the same hat not a splintered way of thinking, but all in harmony together.
name: Alvar Aalto

quote: The higher the building the lower the morals.
name: Noel Coward

quote: A house is a machine for living in.
name: Le Corbusier

quote: A great building must begin with the unmeasurable, must go through measurable means when it is being designed and in the end must be unmeasurable.
name: Louis Kahn

quote: Those who look for the laws of Nature as a support for their new works collaborate with the creator.
name: Antonio Gaudi

quote: Architecture is basically a container of something. I hope they will enjoy not so much the teacup, but the tea.
name: Yoshio Taniguchi

quote: Architecture is the learned game, correct and magnificent, of forms assembled in the light.
name: Le Corbusier

quote: I believe that the way people live can be directed a little by architecture.
name: Tadao Ando

quote: Space has always been the spiritual dimension of architecture. It is not the physical statement of the structure so much as what it contains that moves us.
name: Arthur Erickson

quote: Great buildings that move the spirit have always been rare. In every case they are unique, poetic, products of the heart.
name: Arthur Erickson

quote: Architecture starts when you carefully put two bricks together. There it begins.
name: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe

quote: I try to give people a different way of looking at their surroundings. That's art to me.
name: Maya Lin

quote: Architecture is the reaching out for the truth.
name: Louis Kahn

quote: We should concentrate our work not only to a separated housing problem but housing involved in our daily work and all the other functions of the city.
name: Alvar Aalto

quote: Make big plans aim high in hope and work, remembering that a noble, logical diagram once recorded will not die.
name: Daniel Burnham

quote: Architecture arouses sentiments in man. The architect's task therefore, is to make those sentiments more precise.
name: Adolf Loos

quote: To provide meaningful architecture is not to parody history but to articulate it.
name: Daniel Libeskind

quote: To me, a building - if it's beautiful - is the love of one man, he's made it out of his love for space, materials, things like that.
name: Martha Graham

quote: Form follows profit is the aesthetic principle of our times.
name: Richard Rogers

quote: Warmth isn't what minimalists are thought to have.
name: Maya Lin

quote: But the building's identity resided in the ornament.
name: Louis Sullivan

quote: It is not the beauty of a building you should look at its the construction of the foundation that will stand the test of time.
name: David Allan Coe

quote: I hate vacations. If you can build buildings, why sit on the beach?
name: Philip Johnson

quote: A city building, you experience when you walk a suburban building, you experience when you drive.
name: Helmut Jahn

quote: Every building is a prototype. No two are alike.
name: Helmut Jahn

quote: The loftier the building, the deeper must the foundation be laid.
name: Thomas a Kempis

quote: I love building spaces: architecture, furniture, all of it, probably more than fashion. The development procedure is more tactile. It's about space and form and it's something you can share with other people.
name: Donna Karan

quote: Architecture is a visual art, and the buildings speak for themselves.
name: Julia Morgan

quote: We build buildings which are terribly restless. And buildings don't go anywhere. They shouldn't be restless.
name: Minoru Yamasaki

quote: Architecture tends to consume everything else, it has become one's entire life.
name: Arne Jacobsen

quote: What people want, above all, is order.
name: Stephen Gardiner

quote: The interior of the house personifies the private world the exterior of it is part of the outside world.
name: Stephen Gardiner

quote: If you give people nothingness, they can ponder what can be achieved from that nothingness.
name: Tadao Ando

quote: Nothing requires the architect's care more than the due proportions of buildings.
name: Marcus V. Pollio

quote: Proportions are what makes the old Greek temples classic in their beauty. They are like huge blocks, from which the air has been literally hewn out between the columns.
name: Arne Jacobsen

quote: Architecture is not an inspirational business, it's a rational procedure to do sensible and hopefully beautiful things that's all.
name: Harry Seidler

quote: Not many architects have the luxury to reject significant things.
name: Rem Koolhaas

quote: Cities are the greatest creations of humanity.
name: Daniel Libeskind

quote: No architect troubled to design houses that suited people who were to live in them, because that would have meant building a whole range of different houses. It was far cheaper and, above all, timesaving to make them identical.
name: Michael Ende

quote: If I have a style, I am not aware of it.
name: Michael Graves

quote: Don't clap too hard - it's a very old building.
name: John Osborne

quote: Form follows function.
name: Louis Sullivan

quote: The work of art shows people new directions and thinks of the future. The house thinks of the present.
name: Adolf Loos

quote: My buildings don't speak in words but by means of their own spaciousness.
name: Thom Mayne

quote: Designed by architects with honorable intentions but hands of palsy.
name: Jimmy Breslin

quote: The dialogue between client and architect is about as intimate as any conversation you can have, because when you're talking about building a house, you're talking about dreams.
name: Robert A. M. Stern

quote: The Romans were not inventors of the supporting arch, but its extended use in vaults and intersecting barrel shapes and domes is theirs.
name: Harry Seidler

quote: The bungalow had more to do with how Americans live today than any other building that has gone remotely by the name of architecture in our history.
name: Russell Lynes

quote: Color in certain places has the great value of making the outlines and structural planes seem more energetic.
name: Antonio Gaudi

quote: In any architecture, there is an equity between the pragmatic function and the symbolic function.
name: Michael Graves

quote: At a certain point, I just put the building and the art impulse together. I decided that building was a legitimate way to make sculpture.
name: Martin Puryear

quote: For many years, I have lived uncomfortably with the belief that most planning and architectural design suffers for lack of real and basic purpose. The ultimate purpose, it seems to me, must be the improvement of mankind.
name: James Rouse

quote: The frightening thought that what you draw may become a building makes for reasoned lines.
name: Saul Steinberg

quote: Buildings should serve people, not the other way around.
name: John Portman

quote: Architects in the past have tended to concentrate their attention on the building as a static object. I believe dynamics are more important: the dynamics of people, their interaction with spaces and environmental condition.
name: John Portman

quote: My buildings will be my legacy... they will speak for me long after I'm gone.
name: Julia Morgan

quote: In Los Angeles, by the time you're 35, you're older than most of the buildings.
name: Delia Ephron

quote: Rome has not seen a modern building in more than half a century. It is a city frozen in time.
name: Richard Meier

quote: Even at the United Nations, where legend has it that the building was designed so that there could be no corner offices, the expanse of glass in individual offices is said to be a dead giveaway as to rank. Five windows are excellent, one window not so great.
name: Enid Nemy

quote: I have designed the most buildings of any living American architect.
name: Alexander Jackson Davis

quote: I am but an architectural composer.
name: Alexander Jackson Davis

quote: As a designer, the mission with which we have been charged is simple: providing space at the right cost.
name: Harry von Zell

quote: They can do without architecture who have no olives nor wines in the cellar.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I call architecture frozen music.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Fashion is architecture: it is a matter of proportions.
name: Coco Chanel

quote: The greatest advances of civilization, whether in architecture or painting, in science and literature, in industry or agriculture, have never come from centralized government.
name: Milton Friedman

quote: I paint mostly from real life. It has to start with that. Real people, real street scenes, behind the curtain scenes, live models, paintings, photographs, staged setups, architecture, grids, graphic design. Whatever it takes to make it work.
name: Bob Dylan

quote: Prose is architecture, not interior decoration, and the Baroque is over.
name: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Switzerland is a small, steep country, much more up and down than sideways, and is all stuck over with large brown hotels built on the cuckoo clock style of architecture.
name: Ernest Hemingway

quote: The ancient Romans built their greatest masterpieces of architecture, their amphitheaters, for wild beasts to fight in.
name: Voltaire

quote: Architecture has recorded the great ideas of the human race. Not only every religious symbol, but every human thought has its page in that vast book.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: There are no rules of architecture for a castle in the clouds.
name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: All architecture is great architecture after sunset perhaps architecture is really a nocturnal art, like the art of fireworks.
name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Every man's work, whether it be literature, or music or pictures or architecture or anything else, is always a portrait of himself.
name: Samuel Butler

quote: I was planning to go into architecture. But when I arrived, architecture was filled up. Acting was right next to it, so I signed up for acting instead.
name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Talking about music is like dancing about architecture.
name: Steve Martin

quote: Architecture begins where engineering ends.
name: Walter Gropius

quote: The mother art is architecture. Without an architecture of our own we have no soul of our own civilization.
name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: The terrifying and edible beauty of Art Nouveau architecture.
name: Salvador Dali

quote: It is impossible, as impossible as to raise the dead, to restore anything that has ever been great or beautiful in architecture. That which I have insisted upon as the life of the whole, that spirit which is given only by the hand and eye of the workman, can never be recalled.
name: John Ruskin

quote: A man of eighty has outlived probably three new schools of painting, two of architecture and poetry and a hundred in dress.
name: Lord Byron

quote: No architecture is so haughty as that which is simple.
name: John Ruskin

quote: It seems a fantastic paradox, but it is nevertheless a most important truth, that no architecture can be truly noble which is not imperfect.
name: John Ruskin

quote: Organic architecture seeks superior sense of use and a finer sense of comfort, expressed in organic simplicity.
name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: Convinced as I am and as I am from my government that the world needs a new moral architecture over all I believe that this should be the first topic to debate in our world of today, ethics, moral.
name: Hugo Chavez

quote: Maybe we can show government how to operate better as a result of better architecture. Eventually, I think Chicago will be the most beautiful great city left in the world.
name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: Noble life demands a noble architecture for noble uses of noble men. Lack of culture means what it has always meant: ignoble civilization and therefore imminent downfall.
name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: Architecture is the will of an epoch translated into space.
name: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe

quote: All the revision in the world will not save a bad first draft: for the architecture of the thing comes, or fails to come, in the first conception, and revision only affects the detail and ornament, alas!
name: T. E. Lawrence

quote: All architecture is shelter, all great architecture is the design of space that contains, cuddles, exalts, or stimulates the persons in that space.
name: Philip Johnson

quote: Even though I build buildings and I pursue my architecture, I pursue it as an artist. I deliberately keep a tiny studio. I don't want to be an architectural firm. I want to remain an artist.
name: Maya Lin

quote: Engineering, medicine, business, architecture and painting are concerned not with the necessary but with the contingent - not with how things are but with how they might be - in short, with design.
name: Herbert Simon

quote: Poetry is not only dream and vision it is the skeleton architecture of our lives. It lays the foundations for a future of change, a bridge across our fears of what has never been before.
name: Audre Lorde

quote: The art of dancing stands at the source of all the arts that express themselves first in the human person. The art of building, or architecture, is the beginning of all the arts that lie outside the person and in the end they unite.
name: Havelock Ellis

quote: All real education is the architecture of the soul.
name: William Bennett

quote: Nothing is as dangerous in architecture as dealing with separated problems. If we split life into separated problems we split the possibilities to make good building art.
name: Alvar Aalto

quote: The details are the very source of expression in architecture. But we are caught in a vice between art and the bottom line.
name: Arthur Erickson

quote: Architecture theory is very interesting.
name: David Byrne

quote: Today's developer is a poor substitute for the committed entrepreneur of the last century for whom the work of architecture represented a chance to celebrate the worth of his enterprise.
name: Arthur Erickson

quote: Rationalism is the enemy of art, though necessary as a basis for architecture.
name: Arthur Erickson

quote: When you look at Japanese traditional architecture, you have to look at Japanese culture and its relationship with nature. You can actually live in a harmonious, close contact with nature - this very unique to Japan.
name: Tadao Ando

quote: I would have liked maybe to be in architecture or painting, something connected to the fine arts.
name: Catherine Deneuve

quote: The principle of the Gothic architecture is infinity made imaginable.
name: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: Consider the momentous event in architecture when the wall parted and the column became.
name: Louis Kahn

quote: Architecture and building is about how you get around the obstacles that are presented to you. That sometimes determines how successful you'll be: How good are you at going around obstacles?
name: Jeremy Renner

quote: I could have been an architect, but I don't think I'd have been very happy. Nearly all modern architecture is a silly game as far as I can see.
name: Roger Waters

quote: I see music as fluid architecture.
name: Joni Mitchell

quote: Architecture doesn't come from theory. You don't think your way through a building.
name: Arthur Erickson

quote: Does an architecture to assuage the spirit have a place?
name: Arthur Erickson

quote: The new architecture of transparency and lightness comes from Japan and Europe.
name: Arthur Erickson

quote: The way of architecture is the quiet voice that underlies it and has guided it from the beginning.
name: Arthur Erickson

quote: Vitality is radiated from exceptional art and architecture.
name: Arthur Erickson

quote: We are stymied by regulations, limited choice and the threat of litigation. Neither consultants nor industry itself provide research which takes architecture forward.
name: Arthur Erickson

quote: To work in architecture you are so much involved with society, with politics, with bureaucrats. It's a very complicated process to do large projects. You start to see the society, how it functions, how it works. Then you have a lot of criticism about how it works.
name: Ai Weiwei

quote: If architecture is frozen music then music must be liquid architecture.
name: Quincy Jones

quote: To create architecture is to put in order. Put what in order? Function and objects.
name: Le Corbusier

quote: I probably spent the first 20 years of my life wanting to be as American as possible. Through my 20s, and into my 30s, I began to become aware of how so much of my art and architecture has a decidedly Eastern character.
name: Maya Lin

quote: I left science, then I went into art, but I approach things very analytically. I choose to pursue both art and architecture as completely separate fields rather than merging them.
name: Maya Lin

quote: The process I go through in the art and the architecture, I actually want it to be almost childlike. Sometimes I think it's magical.
name: Maya Lin

quote: In art or architecture your project is only done when you say it's done. If you want to rip it apart at the eleventh hour and start all over again, you never finish. I was one of those crazy creatures.
name: Maya Lin

quote: I loved logic, math, computer programming. I loved systems and logic approaches. And so I just figured architecture is this perfect combination.
name: Maya Lin

quote: Art is very tricky because it's what you do for yourself. It's much harder for me to make those works than the monuments or the architecture.
name: Maya Lin

quote: In my early 20s I was so miserable doing construction, I wanted something that paid money. I liked nice stuff. I liked cars and architecture, and things that cost money. I wanted to not swing a hammer, and make money... and not do stuff that was dirty. I attempted to get into comedy. I started to do stand-up, but I wasn't very good at it.
name: Adam Carolla

quote: I'm drawn to furniture design as complete architecture on a minor scale.
name: Brad Pitt

quote: The British political system and the whole clapped out Westminster architecture, and the language that we use about politics, it's completely unsustainable. You either decide to be part of that transition to do something different. Or you cling to old certainties.
name: Nick Clegg

quote: I got into this little habit of architecture and building. I designed a house in Colorado and one in Hawaii. The idea is supposed to be build and sell - but then I can never bring myself to sell them.
name: Trey Parker

quote: The only job that was ever of interest to me other than filmmaking is architecture.
name: Christopher Nolan

quote: I would like my architecture to inspire people to use their own resources, to move into the future.
name: Tadao Ando

quote: Any architectural project we do takes at least four or five years, so increasingly there is a discrepancy between the acceleration of culture and the continuing slowness of architecture.
name: Rem Koolhaas

quote: Architecture, of all the arts, is the one which acts the most slowly, but the most surely, on the soul.
name: Ernest Dimnet

quote: In architecture the idea degenerated. Design allows a more direct and pleasurable route.
name: Charles Eames

quote: Post-Modernism was a reaction against Modernism. It came quite early to music and literature, and a little later to architecture. And I think it's still coming to computer science.
name: Larry Wall

quote: Liquid architecture. It's like jazz - you improvise, you work together, you play off each other, you make something, they make something. And I think it's a way of - for me, it's a way of trying to understand the city, and what might happen in the city.
name: Frank Gehry

quote: I see the Beijing National Stadium as an architectural project. I accepted Herzog and De Meuron's invitation to collaborate on the design, and our proposal won the competition. From beginning to end, I stayed with the project. I am committed to fostering relationships between a city and its architecture.
name: Ai Weiwei

quote: The building of the architecture of a novel - the craft of it - is something I never tire of.
name: John Irving

quote: I strive for an architecture from which nothing can be taken away.
name: Helmut Jahn

quote: It's my goal to make a building as immaterial as possible. Architecture is a very material thing. It takes a lot of resources, so why not eliminate what you don't need as long as you're able to achieve the same result?
name: Helmut Jahn

quote: The American attitude towards efficiency and execution should always underlie architecture.
name: Helmut Jahn

quote: The architecture profession has lost a lot of its integrity, especially in the USA. The general architect here has no scruples, no ambitions.
name: Helmut Jahn

quote: I'd like to do a lot of things - whether in design or architecture or business.
name: Caroline Wozniacki

quote: So what we have tried to do in our later buildings is to try to be completely consistent, as a painter is consistent or as a sculptor is consistent. Architecture also must be very consistent.
name: Minoru Yamasaki

quote: Japanese architecture is very much copied in this country and in Europe.
name: Minoru Yamasaki

quote: If you examine this, I think that you will find that it's the mechanics of Japanese architecture that have been thought of as the direct influence upon our architecture.
name: Minoru Yamasaki

quote: If a building becomes architecture, then it is art.
name: Arne Jacobsen

quote: Victorian architecture in the United States was copied straight from England.
name: Stephen Gardiner

quote: The logic of Palladian architecture presented an aesthetic formula which could be applied universally.
name: Stephen Gardiner

quote: The English light is so very subtle, so very soft and misty, that the architecture responded with great delicacy of detail.
name: Stephen Gardiner

quote: The Egyptian contribution to architecture was more concerned with remembering the dead than the living.
name: Stephen Gardiner

quote: Of all the lessons most relevant to architecture today, Japanese flexibility is the greatest.
name: Stephen Gardiner

quote: Georgian architecture respected the scale of both the individual and the community.
name: Stephen Gardiner

quote: French architecture always manages to combine the most magnificent underlying themes of architecture like Roman design, it looks to the community.
name: Stephen Gardiner

quote: Japanese traditional architecture is created based on these conditions. This is the reason you have a very high degree of connection between the outside and inside in architecture.
name: Tadao Ando

quote: The speed of change makes you wonder what will become of architecture.
name: Tadao Ando

quote: Without this spirit, Modernist architecture cannot fully exist. Since there is often a mismatch between the logic and the spirit of Modernism, I use architecture to reconcile the two.
name: Tadao Ando

quote: Italy is full of historical buildings. And Europe holds a great history of philosophy from Greece until today. I read all those books and see these buildings, and I think of where I stand when I design my architecture.
name: Tadao Ando

quote: All those involved in the construction of an architectural design, from the architect to the builder, have an attachment to the architecture, although it's difficult to quantify the attachment.
name: Tadao Ando

quote: Japanese architecture is traditionally based on wooden structures that need renovating on a regular basis.
name: Tadao Ando

quote: Spiritual space is lost in gaining convenience. I saw the need to create a mixture of Japanese spiritual culture and modern western architecture.
name: Tadao Ando

quote: People can inhabit anything. And they can be miserable in anything and ecstatic in anything. More and more I think that architecture has nothing to do with it. Of course, that's both liberating and alarming.
name: Rem Koolhaas

quote: Until the Eighties, Oslo was a rather boring town, but it's changed a lot, and is now much more cosmopolitan. If I go downtown, I visit the harbour to see the tall ships and the ferries, and to admire the modern architecture such as the Opera House or the new Astrup Fearnley Museum on the water's edge.
name: Jo Nesbo

quote: Every time a student walks past a really urgent, expressive piece of architecture that belongs to his college, it can help reassure him that he does have that mind, does have that soul.
name: Louis Kahn

quote: I believe very strongly, and have fought since many years ago - at least over 30 years ago - to get architecture not just within schools, but architecture talked about under history, geography, science, technology, art.
name: Richard Rogers

quote: My house is my refuge, an emotional piece of architecture, not a cold piece of convenience.
name: Luis Barragan

quote: We all love musical architecture there's no doubt about that.
name: Levon Helm

quote: Architecture in general is frozen music.
name: Friedrich von Schelling

quote: Painting, sculpture and architecture are finished, but the art habit continues.
name: Robert Smithson

quote: Bridges are perhaps the most invisible form of public architecture.
name: Bruce Jackson

quote: Look, architecture has a lot of places to hide behind, a lot of excuses. 'The client made me do this.' 'The city made me do this.' 'Oh, the budget.' I don't believe that anymore.
name: Frank Gehry

quote: In fact, it will be very easy to climb the building because of its shape and architecture.
name: Alain Robert

quote: Charles was very intent to use his years as Prince of Wales to make his mark while he still had freedom of maneuver that he wouldn't have as King. The first subject he really went for was architecture. It made an impact.
name: Anthony Holden

quote: It was the drawing that led me to architecture, the search for light and astonishing forms.
name: Oscar Niemeyer

quote: I search for surprise in my architecture. A work of art should cause the emotion of newness.
name: Oscar Niemeyer

quote: Trying to describe something musical is like dancing to architecture, it's really difficult.
name: Robert Palmer

quote: Of the individual poems, some are more lyric and some are more descriptive or narrative. Each poem is fixed in a moment. All those moments written or read together take on the movement and architecture of a narrative.
name: Marilyn Hacker

quote: I don't know why I've always been so captivated by architecture.
name: Tim Gunn

quote: The two elements the traveler first captures in the big city are extra human architecture and furious rhythm. Geometry and anguish.
name: Federico Garcia Lorca

quote: But I absolutely believe that architecture is a social activity that has to do with some sort of communication or places of interaction, and that to change the environment is to change behaviour.
name: Thom Mayne

quote: Architecture is inhabited sculpture.
name: Constantin Brancusi

quote: And when an architect has designed a house with large windows, which is a necessity today in order to pull the daylight into these very deep houses, then curtains come to play a big role in architecture.
name: Arne Jacobsen

quote: I don't see that any buildings should be excluded from the term architecture, as long as they are done properly.
name: Arne Jacobsen

quote: If architecture had nothing to do with art, it would be astonishingly easy to build houses, but the architect's task - his most difficult task - is always that of selecting.
name: Arne Jacobsen

quote: In addressing a task, one almost always has several possible options, sometimes only a few, and they may all be practical and functional. But they lack the aesthetic aspect that raises it to architecture.
name: Arne Jacobsen

quote: If architecture is, as is sometimes said, music set in concrete, then football and basketball may be said to be creativity embodied in team sports.
name: Michael Mandelbaum

quote: The architecture of a story can be a little bit different if it's a true story.
name: Joel Coen

quote: Chicago is known for good steaks, expensive stores and beautiful architecture. Unfortunately, the Windy City also enjoys a reputation for corrupt politics, violent crime, and some of the strictest gun control laws anywhere in the country.
name: Bob Barr

quote: We think of enterprise architecture as the process we use for fully describing and mapping business functionality and business requirements and relating them to information systems requirements.
name: Tony Scott

quote: Escape from the architecture ghetto is one of the major drivers and has been from the very beginning.
name: Rem Koolhaas

quote: The intellectual force of the West is still dominant, but other cultures are getting stronger. I expect that we will develop a new way of thinking in architecture and urban planning, and that less will be based on our models.
name: Rem Koolhaas

quote: People kind of tend to mystify design and architecture by suggesting you need to train.
name: Marc Newson

quote: I mean, certainly writing, painting, photography, dance, architecture, there is an aspect of almost every art form that is useful and that merges into film in some way.
name: Sydney Pollack

quote: I could be happy doing something like architecture. It would involve another couple of years of graduate school, but that's what I studied in college. That's what I always wanted to do.
name: Parker Stevenson

quote: My interest in architecture has always been sculptural. Most of my photography is of architecture.
name: Parker Stevenson

quote: Architecture is a science arising out of many other sciences, and adorned with much and varied learning by the help of which a judgment is formed of those works which are the result of other arts.
name: Marcus V. Pollio

quote: Of course I know very little about architecture, and the older I get the less I know.
name: Richard Rogers

quote: Architecture is about public space held by buildings.
name: Richard Rogers

quote: Architecture is a slow business, and city planning even slower.
name: Richard Rogers

quote: I don't find Hollywood interesting, so I'm thinking of studying architecture instead.
name: Hayden Christensen

quote: Architecture is a art when one consciously or unconsciously creates aesthetic emotion in the atmosphere and when this environment produces well being.
name: Luis Barragan

quote: Every one who has a heart, however ignorant of architecture he may be, feels the transcendent beauty and poetry of the mediaeval churches.
name: Goldwin Smith

quote: Yet for my part, deeply as I am moved by the religious architecture of the Middle Ages, I cannot honestly say that I ever felt the slightest emotion in any modern Gothic church.
name: Goldwin Smith

quote: Winning a competition in architecture is a ticket to oblivion. It's just an idea. Ninety-nine per cent never get built.
name: Daniel Libeskind

quote: I studied architecture in New York. So, really I was very moved, like everyone else, to try to contribute something that has that resonance and profundity of it means to all of us.
name: Daniel Libeskind

quote: Writing about music is like dancing about architecture.
name: Martin Mull

quote: When I'm in London, Claridge's is a great favourite. I'm a big fan of art deco architecture and the rooms are extraordinary.
name: Roman Coppola

quote: I take a lot from everywhere. I take from music, architecture, novels, and plays. Anywhere that hits you.
name: Alex Winter

quote: I've never owned an Apple product. I like the fact that PCs are open architecture and not locked down like Apple products. I feel that Macs are also unjustifiably overpriced.
name: Oren Peli

quote: I've always liked traveling around Europe and seeing the architecture. The buildings in capital cities have been there for hundreds and hundreds and hundreds of years. Some look better than the new ones.
name: Joe Elliott

quote: At this present time, matter is still the best way to think of architecture, but I'm not so sure for very long. The computer is radicalizing the way we think about our world.
name: Ben Nicholson

quote: If you're into architecture and you're from the West, everything is hors d'oeuvres for working to rebuild the Temple. Ultimately you're led there. You can't escape it.
name: Ben Nicholson

quote: You can just drift unhappily towards this vision of heaven on earth, and ultimately that is what architecture is a vision of: Heaven on earth, at it's best.
name: Ben Nicholson

quote: The intellectual architecture means focusing on doing great work instead of focusing on agency politics.
name: Jay Chiat

quote: The team architecture means setting up an organization that helps people produce that great work in teams.
name: Jay Chiat

quote: One of my favorite vacation places is Miami, because of the people, the water and the beach - of course - and the architecture on Miami Beach is so wonderful.
name: Oksana Baiul

quote: I would fix other people's lines if they asked me on occasion. The hard part of writing is the architecture of it, getting the story and structuring it. Not the tweaking of lines.
name: William Devane

quote: But those musics do not address the larger kind of architecture in time that classical music does, whatever each one of us knows that classical music must mean.
name: Michael Tilson Thomas

quote: I quit college. I was studying architecture for about a year.
name: Barry Mann

quote: It is not with architecture that one can disseminate any political ideology.
name: Oscar Niemeyer

quote: Architecture will always express the technical and social progress of the country in which it is carried out. If we wish to give it the human content that it lacks, we must participate in the political struggle.
name: Oscar Niemeyer

quote: Architecture is my work, and I've spent my whole life at a drawing board, but life is more important than architecture. What matters is to improve human beings.
name: Oscar Niemeyer

quote: Architecture is invention.
name: Oscar Niemeyer

quote: When I write now I do not invent situation, characters, or actions, but rather structures and discursive forms, textual groupings which are combined according to secret affinities among themselves, as in architecture or the plastic arts.
name: Juan Goytisolo

quote: The organizational architecture is really that a centipede walks on hundred legs and one or two don't count. So if I lose one or two legs, the process will go on, the organization will go on, the growth will go on.
name: Mukesh Ambani

quote: Does it follow that the house has nothing in common with art and is architecture not to be included in the arts? Only a very small part of architecture belongs to art: the tomb and the monument. Everything else that fulfils a function is to be excluded from the domain of art.
name: Adolf Loos

quote: Architecture is involved with the world, but at the same time it has a certain autonomy. This autonomy cannot be explained in terms of traditional logic because the most interesting parts of the work are non-verbal. They operate within the terms of the work, like any art.
name: Thom Mayne

quote: I'm often called an old-fashioned modernist. But the modernists had the absurd idea that architecture could heal the world. That's impossible. And today nobody expects architects to have these grand visions any more.
name: Thom Mayne

quote: The aesthetic of architecture has to be rooted in a broader idea about human activities like walking, relaxing and communicating. Architecture thinks about how these activities can be given added value.
name: Thom Mayne

quote: You might say that when you step inside, you're entering a honorific space, but that's something totally different than experiencing it. And in architecture the experience comes first. That has the deepest effect on us.
name: Thom Mayne

quote: In my experience, if you have to keep the lavatory door shut by extending your left leg, it's modern architecture.
name: Nancy Banks Smith

quote: I love a lot of things, and I'm pretty much obsessive about most things I do, whether it be gardening, or architecture, or music. I'd be an obsessive hairdresser.
name: Gates McFadden

quote: Doctrines provide an architecture for both Republican and Democrat presidents to carry out policies.
name: Malcolm Wallop

quote: That Moorish architecture is all over the place, of course. It affects me everywhere I see it, as it does so many people. But Brand Library was a special place to me, and I know I've paid homage to it many times in my drawings.
name: Jim Woodring

quote: Information and inspiration are everywhere... history, art, architecture, everything an illustrator needs. Europe is, after all, the land that has generated most of the enduring myths and legends of Western culture.
name: John Howe

quote: Once I got out of architecture school I decided not to be an architect, I just started my own little design studio.
name: Joseph Kosinski

quote: I went to school for engineering, I studied jazz. So I always had this kind of creative side and technical side, and I thought architecture might be the way to combine them, so I went to architecture school in New York.
name: Joseph Kosinski

quote: An important work of architecture will create polemics.
name: Richard Meier

quote: The same sort of thing happened in my dispute with the National Trust book: Follies: A National Trust Guide, which implied that the only pleasure you can get from Folly architecture is by calling the architect mad, and by laughing at the architecture.
name: Ian Hamilton Finlay

quote: I was a student at Columbia College, actually, in the Architecture school. Paul would drive in from Queens, showing me these new songs. I can't remember us working it out.
name: Art Garfunkel

quote: After about the first Millennium, Italy was the cradle of Romanesque architecture, which spread throughout Europe, much of it extending the structural daring with minimal visual elaboration.
name: Harry Seidler

quote: After World War II great strides were made in modern Japanese architecture, not only in advanced technology, allowing earthquake resistant tall buildings, but expressing and infusing characteristics of traditional Japanese architecture in modern buildings.
name: Harry Seidler

quote: The job of buildings is to improve human relations: architecture must ease them, not make them worse.
name: Ralph Erskine

quote: But I feel truly wowed by the architecture and the meaning of the architecture if you get lost in it and think about the man hours in the smallest little chapel, and the love involved. God it's fantastic.
name: Paul Bettany

quote: There was an age, however, when the transition from savagery to civilization, with all its impressive outward manifestations in art and architecture, took place for the first time.
name: James H. Breasted

quote: I think that narrative, fiction filmmaking is the culmination of several art forms: theater, art history, architecture. Whereas doc filmmaking is more pure cinema, like cinema verite is film in its purest form.
name: George Hickenlooper

quote: I was going to be an architect. I graduated with a degree in architecture and I had a scholarship to go back to Princeton and get my Masters in architecture. I'd done theatricals in college, but I'd done them because it was fun.
name: James Stewart

quote: But after the time there I'd had it with fashion again, so I left to go to architecture school in a summer course at Harvard, which didn't last very long.
name: Stephen Sprouse

quote: Architecture can't fully represent the chaos and turmoil that are part of the human personality, but you need to put some of that turmoil into the architecture, or it isn't real.
name: Frank Stella

quote: I would like to attend college in the future when I have time. I have always been interested in architecture, so perhaps I would pursue a degree in that or business.
name: James Maslow

quote: You look at the steamboat, the railroad, the car, the airplane - not all of these were invented in the Anglo-American world, but they were popularized and extended by it. They were made possible by the financial architecture, the capital intensive operations invented and developed by the Anglo-Americans.
name: Walter Russell Mead

quote: What's fascinating about D.C., the exteriors are these elaborate structures, this gorgeous architecture and beautiful stonework, and then you go inside and it's crap-looking - apart from the White House, which is beautiful.
name: Tony Hale

quote: I acquired an admiration for Japanese culture, art, and architecture, and learned of the existence of the game of GO, which I still play.
name: Philip Warren Anderson

quote: I would've been intrigued by being a film director. I would've been intrigued by politics. I thought about architecture.
name: Charlie Rose

quote: There is a lot of interest in the arts, music, theatre, filmmaking, engineering, architecture and software design. I think we have now transitioned the modern-day version of the entrepreneur into the creative economy.
name: John Baldacci

quote: I like things that are kind of eclectic, when one thing doesn't go with another. That's why I love Rome. The town itself is that way. It's where Fascist architecture meets classic Renaissance, where the ancient bangs up against the contemporary. It has a touch of everything. That's my style, and that's what my work is about.
name: Giambattista Valli

quote: I feel however, that we architects have a special duty and mission... (to contribute) to the socio-cultural development of architecture and urban planning.
name: Kenzo Tange

quote: There is a powerful need for symbolism, and that means the architecture must have something that appeals to the human heart. There is a powerful need for symbolism, and that means the architecture must have something that appeals to the human heart.
name: Kenzo Tange

quote: Technological considerations are of great importance to architecture and cities in the informational society.
name: Kenzo Tange

quote: Opera, next to Gothic architecture, is one of the strangest inventions of Western man. It could not have been foreseen by any logical process.
name: Kenneth Clark

quote: I don't believe in morality in architecture.
name: Michael Graves

quote: I have no requirements for a style of architecture.
name: Michael Graves

quote: I see architecture not as Gropius did, as a moral venture, as truth, but as invention, in the same way that poetry or music or painting is invention.
name: Michael Graves

quote: The dialogue of architecture has been centered too long around the idea of truth.
name: Michael Graves

quote: The rules of navigation never navigated a ship. The rules of architecture never built a house.
name: Thomas Reid

quote: Each new situation requires a new architecture.
name: Jean Nouvel

quote: I like to play with architecture! It's my favorite game.
name: Jean Nouvel

quote: I think architecture has to be a gift.
name: Jean Nouvel

quote: What is being called the UN 'gender architecture' is more like a shack. Women need a bigger global house if equality is ever to become a reality.
name: Charlotte Bunch

quote: Architecture is politics.
name: Mitchell Kapor

quote: What has happened to architecture since the second world war that the only passers-by who can contemplate it without pain are those equipped with a white stick and a dog?
name: Bernard Levin

quote: First, there is the bare beauty of the logs themselves with their long lines and firm curves. Then there is the open charm felt of the structural features which are not hidden under plaster and ornament, but are clearly revealed, a charm felt in Japanese architecture.
name: Gustav Stickley

quote: Architecture aims at Eternity.
name: Christopher Wren

quote: Revived in this country the long forgotten beauties of Gothic architecture.
name: James Wyatt

quote: Any work of architecture that has with it some discussion, some polemic, I think is good. It shows that people are interested, people are involved.
name: Richard Meier

quote: There will never be great architects or great architecture without great patrons.
name: Edwin Lutyens

quote: The architecture of our future is not only unfinished the scaffolding has hardly gone up.
name: George Lamming
